Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Ardmore
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted near Broadway/Ardmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, Devon, and resume normal route: due to street blockage near Broadway/Ardmore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark and #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison.
ShortDescription: 22 Clark and 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a Cubs game near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark and #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a Cubs game near Clark/Addison.

#22 Clark buses will operate via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark.

#152 Addison buses will operate via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Canal

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses temp. rerouted : due to, construction near Jackson/Canal.

Southbound buses will operate via Adams, Wacker, Madison, Clinton and Quincy including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via Clinton, Van Buren, Jefferson, Monroe, Wacker and Jackson

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson, #15 Jeffery Local and #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute near 67th/ Ridgeland
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson, 15 Jeffery Local and 67 67th/69th/71st buses are temp. rerouted in both directions near 67th/Ridgeland, due to police activity near 67th/Ridgeland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#6 Jackson, #15 Jeffery Local and #67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 67th/Ridgeland, due to police activity near 67th/Ridgeland.

#6 Jackson and #15 Jeffery Local buses will operate via Stony Island, Marquette, Jeffrey, 67th and over regular route.

#67 67th/69th/71st buses will operate via Marquette, Jeffery, 67th and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare Bound Blue Line Service Delayed Oak Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare Bound Blue Line  trains are standing at Oak Park due to a mechanical issue. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare Bound Blue Line  trains are standing Oak Park due to a mechanical issue. Crews working to restore service.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: 

#91 Austin

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
